apple_vendor_description: This individual emoji on Apple devices features a person with a medium-light skin tone and a completely bald head, rendered with Apple’s signature soft rounded edges and smooth, natural gradients. Realistic lighting highlights the contours of the face, conveying a sense of calm, intelligence, or a straightforward demeanor. It’s a versatile emoji often used to represent people in a neutral or professional context, or to signify personal attributes like simplicity or a focus on inner qualities.
